data.eml:eml: Madicolous Chironomidae from the Brazilian Atlantic Forest: a checklist with notes on altitudinal distributions (Diptera, Insecta)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Shimabukuro, Erika Mayumi, Trivinho-Strixino, Susana (2018): Madicolous Chironomidae from the Brazilian Atlantic Forest: a checklist with notes on altitudinal distributions (Diptera, Insecta). ZooKeys 751: 41-73, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.751.20611, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.751.20611
